comment:
* Representation of a sensor on a remote device, capable of sending events, such as an * accelerometer or a gyroscope. * *

A virtual sensor device is registered with the sensor framework as a runtime sensor. * * @hide

methods.comment:
* Returns the unique handle of the sensor.

     * @hide

methods.comment: * Returns the type of the sensor. * * @see Sensor#getType() * @see Sensor types

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of the sensor.

methods.name: public int getDeviceId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the identifier of the
     * {@link android.companion.virtual.VirtualDeviceManager.VirtualDevice} this sensor belongs to.
